anya-e0807n2:2_0: Tattha ekampi atthaṁ kammādivasena ekattādivasena ca vibhajantīti vibhattiyo, syādayo.
anya-e0807n2:2_1: Tā pana paṭhamādibhedena sattavidhā. Tā yathā ‘‘paṭhamā+tthamatte’’ti paṭhamāvibhatti
anya-e0807n2:2_2: hoti. Sissa okāra+lopa+a-mādesesu naro itthī napuṁsakaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:6: Jāti kriyā guṇo dabbaṁ, tathā nāmanti pañcadhā;
anya-e0807n2:15: Ettha paṭo sukkoti vinassanasabhāvo ca casaddena vipulo ākāsoti avinassanasabhāvo ca attani visuṁ guṇarahito guṇo+ccate tyattho.
anya-e0807n2:16: Yaṁ yaṁ visessate kiñci, taṁ taṁ dabba+miho+ccate;
anya-e0807n2:18: Ettha gojāti assajātīti vutte jāti dabbaṁ. Nīlo guṇoti ca guṇo dabbaṁ. Pacanakriyāti ca gamanādikriyāto visesiyatīti kriyāva dabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:20: Nāmanti taṁ yathā citto, saññā saddo tu taddhanī.
anya-e0807n2:21_0: Nāmassa dabbattepi cittotyādi nāmeneva pasijjhati, no ghaṭa+paṭādayova dabbattena,
anya-e0807n2:21_1: tasmā nāma+miti saññī kathīyate, taṁvācakattā tabbatī cittādi saññāsaddoti nicchiyateyya+dhippāyo.
anya-e0807n2:22_0: Ayaṁ pañcavidhopi attho saddattho ceva sāmatthiyā gamyamānattho cāti dubbidho. Tathā
anya-e0807n2:22_1: hi ‘‘pīno divā na bhuñjeyya’’miti bhuttinirākati saddattho. Rattibhutti tu sāmatthiyā+vagamyate. Tene+taṁ vuccati –
anya-e0807n2:25: Mukhyo tu nirantaratthe, lakkhaṇo tu tirohite;
anya-e0807n2:27: ‘‘Mañce’’ti nirantaratthe vattamāno mukhyo, ‘‘mañcā ugghosantī’’ti tirohitatthe vattamāno lakkhaṇo, gāthādisakalavākyassa+tthe vattamāno byañjanasabhāvo.
anya-e0807n2:30: Vacco lakkhaṇiko byaṅgyo, cevaṁ saddo suvācako;
anya-e0807n2:33: Ti āmantaṇādhike atthamatte paṭhamāvibhatti hoti. Bho nara, bho itthi, bho napuṁsaka.
anya-e0807n2:36: Kriyā nimittaṁ kārakantu kamma, kattu, karaṇa, sampadāna, avadhi, ādhārabhedena chabbidhaṁ, taṁ yathā –
anya-e0807n2:38_0: Karīyati kattukiriyāya sambandhīyatīti kammaṁ, tasmiṁ kammakārake dutiyāvibhatti
anya-e0807n2:38_1: hoti. Taṁ tividhaṁ nibbatti, vikati, patti bhedena, tattha nibbattikamme mātā puttaṁ
anya-e0807n2:38_2: vijāyati, āhāro sukhaṁ janayati, kaṭaṁ karoti datto. Vikatiyaṁ kaṭṭha+maṅgāraṁ karoti,
anya-e0807n2:38_3: suvaṇṇaṁ kaṭakaṁ karoti, vīhayo lunāti. Pattiyaṁ datto gharaṁ pavisati, ādiccaṁ passati,
anya-e0807n2:42_0: Kaṭaṁ karoti vipulaṁ dassanīyanti attheva guṇayuttassa kammatā, vipulaṁ karoti, dassanīyaṁ
anya-e0807n2:42_1: karotīti kriyāya sambandhiyamānattā. Odano paccateti odanasaddato kammatā nappatīyate,
anya-e0807n2:43_0: Icchitakammaṁ yathā-gāvuṁ payo dohati, gomantaṁ gāvaṁ yācati, gāva+mava rundhati
anya-e0807n2:43_1: vajaṁ, māṇavakaṁ maggaṁ pucchati, gomantaṁ gāvaṁ bhikkhate, rukkha+mavacināti phalāni,
anya-e0807n2:43_2: rukkhātyattho. Sissaṁ dhammaṁ brūte. Ettha payo, gāvaṁ iccādi icchitaṁ, gāvuṁ, gomanta+miccādi
anya-e0807n2:43_3: anicchitaṁ. Eva+manicchitepi kaṇṭakaṁ maddati, visaṁ gilati. Yaṁ nevi+cchitaṁ, nāpi
anya-e0807n2:44_0: Ādhāre adhisi+ṭhā+sānaṁ payoge ca, pathaviṁ adhisessati, gāma+madhitiṭṭhati, rukkha+majjhāsateti.
anya-e0807n2:44_1: Ettha pathavinti pathaviyanti attho. Eva+mabhi, nipubbavisassāpi, dhamma+mabhinivisate,
anya-e0807n2:44_2: dhamme vā. Tathā upa, nva+jjhā+pubbavasatissa, gāma+mupavasati, gāma+manuvasati,
anya-e0807n2:44_3: vihāra+madhivasati, gāma+māvasati, agāraṁ ajjhavasati, ettha gāmanti gāmetyattho.
anya-e0807n2:44_4: Tathā tappānā+cārepi, nadiṁ pibati, gāmaṁ carati, nadiyaṁtyattho. Sace maṁ nālapissatīti
anya-e0807n2:44_5: mayā saddhiṁtyattho. Vihitāva paṭi-yogepi dutiyā, paṭibhantu taṁ cunda bojjhaṅgā,
anya-e0807n2:44_6: tampaṭi bojjhaṅgā bhāsantūti attho. Upamā maṁ patibhāti , upamā maṁ upaṭṭhātityattho.
anya-e0807n2:46_0: Kāladdhānaṁ dabba+guṇa+kriyāhi accantasaṁyoge tehi kāladdhānavācīhi dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0807n2:46_1: Kāle-sattāhaṁ gavapānaṁ, māsaṁ maṁsodanaṁ, saradaṁ ramaṇīyā nadī, sabbakālaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ
anya-e0807n2:46_2: nandanaṁ, tayo māse abhidhammaṁ deseti. Addhani-yojanaṁ vanarāji, yojanaṁ dīgho pabbato, kosaṁ sajjhāyati.
anya-e0807n2:47_0: Pubbanhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā, ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā, imaṁ rattiṁ cattāro mahārājānoti
anya-e0807n2:47_1: evamādīsu kālavācīhi accantasaṁyoge dutiyā, bahulaṁvidhānā vibhattivipallāso vā.
anya-e0807n2:49_0: Gatyatthānaṁ bodhatthānaṁ āhāratthānaṁ saddatthāna+makammakānaṁ bhajjādīnañca payojje
anya-e0807n2:49_1: kattari dutiyā hoti. Datto gamayati māṇavakaṁ gāmaṁ, yāpayati vā. Guru bodhayati
anya-e0807n2:49_2: māṇavakaṁ dhammaṁ, vedayati vā. Mātā bhojayati putta+modanaṁ, āsayati vā. Guru ajjhāpayati
anya-e0807n2:49_3: sissaṁ vedaṁ, pāṭhayati vā. Payojjato+ññatra kamme dutiyā. Poso āsayati dattaṁ, sāyayati
anya-e0807n2:49_4: vā. Poso aññaṁ bhajjāpeti, aññaṁ koṭṭāpeti, aññaṁ santharāpeti.
anya-e0807n2:51_0: Harādīnaṁ payojje kattari dutiyā hoti vā. Poso hāreti bhāraṁ dattaṁ, datteneti vā.
anya-e0807n2:51_1: Dassayate janaṁ rājā, janeneti vā. Abhivādayate guruṁ dattaṁ, datteneti vā. Ajjhohāreti
anya-e0807n2:51_2: sattuṁ dattaṁ, datteneti vā. Kāreti datto dattaṁ, datteneti vā. Pakkhe sabbatra kattari tatiyā.
anya-e0807n2:53_0: Khādādīnaṁ payojje kattari dutiyā na hoti. Gatyatthādīsu kvaci paṭisedhattha+midaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:53_1: Khādayati datto dattena, ādayati dattena, avhāpayati datthena, saddāyayati dattena,
anya-e0807n2:55_0: Dhiādīhi yuttato dutiyā hoti. Dhi+ratthu+maṁ putikāyaṁ, antarā ca rājagahaṁ antarā
anya-e0807n2:55_1: ca nālandaṁ, rājagahassa ca nālandassa ca vivarabhūte majjheti attho. Samādhāna+mantarena,
anya-e0807n2:57_0: Lakkhaṇādīsva+tthesu abhinā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti. Rukkha+mabhivijjotate cando, ettha
anya-e0807n2:57_1: rukkho lakkhaṇaṁ, cando lakkhitabbo, tatra abhinā rukkhassa lakkhaṇavuttitā pakāsīyatīti
anya-e0807n2:57_2: rukkho abhinā yutto nāma. Sādhu devadatto mātara+mabhi, mātari sādhuttaṁ pattotyattho.
anya-e0807n2:57_3: Rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁabhi vijjotate cando, rukkhe rukkhetyattho.
anya-e0807n2:59_0: Patiparīhi yuttato lakkhaṇādīsu bhāge ca+tthe dutiyā hoti. Rukkhaṁpati vijjotate,
anya-e0807n2:59_1: sādhu devadatto mātaraṁpati, rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁpati tiṭṭhati, ya+dettha maṁ pati siyā,
anya-e0807n2:59_2: yo mama bhāgo, so dīyatutyattho. Evaṁ rukkhaṁparityādipi.
anya-e0807n2:61: Lakkhaṇādīsu dutiyā. Rukkhamanu vijjotate, saccakiriya+manu vassi, hetu ca lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati, sādhu devadatto mātara+manu, rukkhaṁ rukkha+manu vijjotate, yadettha maṁanu siyā.
anya-e0807n2:63: Sahatthe anunā yuttamhā dutiyā. Pabbata+manu tiṭṭhati, pabbatena saha tyattho.
anya-e0807n2:65: Hīnatthe anunā yuttamhā dutiyā. Anusāriputtaṁ paññavanto bhikkhū, sāriputtato paññāya hīnātyattho.
anya-e0807n2:67: Hīnatthe upena yuttamhā dutiyā. Upasāriputtaṁ paññavanto.
anya-e0807n2:69_0: Kattari karaṇe ca kārake tatiyā hoti. Jinena desito dhammo, buddhena jito māro, ahinā
anya-e0807n2:69_1: daṭṭho naro. Yattha kāraṇakāraṇampi kāraṇavasena vuccati, tatthāpi tatiyā, corehi
anya-e0807n2:69_2: gāmo daḍḍho, tiṇehi bhattaṁ siddhaṁ, saddhehi kāritā vihārā.
anya-e0807n2:71: Apayutto payutto vā, sa kattāti pavuccati.
anya-e0807n2:72: Karaṇe-taṁ pana duvidhaṁ ajjhattikabāhiravasena, yathā hatthena kammaṁ karoti, cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, manasā dhammaṁ viññāyati. Dattena vihayo lunāti, agginā kuṭiṁ jhāpeti.
anya-e0807n2:75_0: Pakatiyā abhirūpo, gottena gotamo iccādi bhūdhātussa sambhavā karaṇe tatiyā. Tathā
anya-e0807n2:75_1: sāriputtoti nāmena vissuto, jātiyā khattiyo buddho, jātiyā sattavassiko, sippena
anya-e0807n2:75_2: naḷakāro so, ekūnatiṁso vayasā, evaṁ samena dhāvati, visamena dhāvati, dvidoṇena dhaññaṁ kiṇāti.
anya-e0807n2:77_0: Sahatthena yoge tatiyā siyā. Tatiyāpi chaṭṭhīva appadhāne eva bhavati. Puttena sahā+gato,
anya-e0807n2:77_1: puttena saddhiṁ āgato, vitakkena saha vattati, puttena saha thūlo, nisīdi bhagavā
anya-e0807n2:77_2: saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena, sahassena samaṁ mitā, sabbehi me piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo.
anya-e0807n2:79_0: Lakkhaṇe vattamānato tatiyā. Bhinnena sīsena paggharantena lohitena paṭīvissake ujjhāpesi,
anya-e0807n2:79_1: ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṁ navaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeyya, tidaṇḍakena paribbājaka+maddakkhi,
anya-e0807n2:79_2: akkhinā kāṇo, hatthena kuṇī, pādena khañjo, piṭṭhiyā khujjo. Tena hi vikalaṅgena
anya-e0807n2:81: Vāsādilakkhaṇakriyāya hetuto tatiyā. Annena vasati, vijjāya vasati, na jaccā vasalo hoti, kammunā vasalo hoti, dānena bhogavā, ācārena kulaṁ, tena pāṇi kāmadado.
anya-e0807n2:83: Iṇe hetumhi pañcamī vā. Satasmā baddho, satena vā.
anya-e0807n2:85_0: Paraṅgabhūte hetumhi pañcamī hoti vā. Jaḷattā baddho, jaḷattenavā, paññāya mutto,
anya-e0807n2:85_1: hutvā abhāvato aniccā, saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho. Bahulaṁvidhānā sattamyatthehipi,
anya-e0807n2:85_2: tena samayena, kālena dhammasākacchā, puratthimena dhataraṭṭho, dakkhiṇena virūḷhako,
anya-e0807n2:85_3: uttarena kapilavatthu, yena bhagavā, tenupasaṅkami, so vo mama+ccayena satthāti.
anya-e0807n2:85_4: Māsena bhuñjati, ekāheneva bārāṇasiṁ pāvisi, navahi māsehi vihāraṁ kārāpesi , kahāpaṇena
anya-e0807n2:85_5: ūno, dhanena vikalo, asinā kalaho, ācārena nipuṇo, guḷena missakaṁ, vācāya sakhilo,
anya-e0807n2:85_6: maṇinā attho, dhanena attho, yojanena gacchati iccādi hetumhi karaṇe vā tatiyā. Attanāva
anya-e0807n2:85_7: attānaṁ sammannatīti paccatte bahulaṁvidhānā kattari tatiyā. Evaṁ tilehi khette vapatīti
anya-e0807n2:85_8: kammatthe, sumuttā mayaṁ tena mahāsamaṇenāti pañcamyatthe ca.
anya-e0807n2:87_0: Acetanaṁ sacetanaṁ vā paṭiggāhakabhāvenā+pekkhitaṁ, taṁ sampadānaṁ, tañca dā-dāneti
anya-e0807n2:87_1: dhātuto byappena yuttameva, tattha catutthī hoti. Tañca dīyamānassa vatthuno anivāraṇa+jjhesanā+numatito
anya-e0807n2:87_2: tividho, yathā buddhassa pupphaṁ deti, bodhirukkhassa jalaṁ deti, yācakassa dhanaṁ
anya-e0807n2:90: Ādhāravivakkhāyaṁ sattamīpi, saṅghe gotami dehi, saṅghe dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi, yā palālamayaṁ mālaṁ, nārī datvāna cetiyeti.
anya-e0807n2:92_0: Tādatthye catutthī siyā. Tadatthassa bhāve, tādatthyaṁ, tasmiṁ tadatthabhāve jotanīyeva
anya-e0807n2:92_1: catutthī siyā. Tadatthassa bhāvoti nimittanimittīsambandhe chaṭṭhī, tasmā chaṭṭhāpavādo+yaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:92_2: Samepi nimittanimittīnaṁ sambandhe nimittabhūtayūpatova catutthī, no nimittībhūtadāruto.
anya-e0807n2:92_3: Yūpāya dāru, pākāya vajati, buddhassatthāya jīvitaṁ pariccajāmi, neva davāya, na
anya-e0807n2:92_4: madāya, ūnassa pāripūriyā, atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṁvattati, lokānukampāya, phāsu vihārāya.
anya-e0807n2:93: Iccāyaṁ kaccāyane upari vakkhamānassa catutthīti sādhitattā idha chaṭṭhīti dīpanatthaṁ vuccate –
anya-e0807n2:94_0: Kassa sādu naruccati, mā ayasmantānampi saṅghabhedo ruccittha, khamati saṅghassa,
anya-e0807n2:94_1: bhatta+massa nacchādetīti chaṭṭhī sambandhavacanicchāyaṁ, na ce+vaṁ virodho siyā,
anya-e0807n2:94_2: sadisarūpattā, evaṁvidhesu ca sambandhassa saddikānumatattā. Tathā hi bhāgavuttiyā
anya-e0807n2:94_3: ‘‘upapadavibhatti chaṭṭhiyā+pavādā’’ti vuttaṁ, saddantare vihitā vibhatti upapadavibhatti.
anya-e0807n2:95_0: Kassa vā tvaṁ dhammaṁ rocesīti atthamatte paṭhamā, kassa vā tuyhanti avatvā kassa
anya-e0807n2:95_1: vā tvaṁ dhammaṁ rocesīti atthamatte paṭhamāvasena byabhicāradassanā. Eva+maññāpi
anya-e0807n2:96_0: Rañño sataṁ dhāreti rañño chattaṁ dhāretīti sambandhe chaṭṭhīva. Silāgha=kathane,
anya-e0807n2:96_1: evaṁ rañño silāghate iccādi, thutiṁ karotītyattho. Hanu=apanayane, rañño hanute,
anya-e0807n2:96_2: vañcetītyattho. Upatiṭṭheyya sakyaputtānaṁ vaḍḍhakī, upagaccheyyātyattho. Sapa=akkose,
anya-e0807n2:96_3: mayhaṁ sapate, saccaṁ kurutetyattho . Dhara=dhāraṇe, suvaṇṇaṁ te dhārayate, iṇaṁ
anya-e0807n2:96_4: te dhārayati, assa rañño nāgaṁ dhārayāma. Piha=icchāyaṁ, devāpi tassa pihayanti tādino,
anya-e0807n2:96_5: tesaṁ pihayanti sambuddhānaṁ satīmataṁ, pihayanti=patthenti. Tassa kujjha mahāvīra,
anya-e0807n2:96_6: yadi+haṁ tassa pakuppeyyaṁ, dubhayati disānaṁ megho, yo mittānaṁ na dūbhati, yo appaduṭṭhassa
anya-e0807n2:96_7: narassa dussati. Issa=issāyaṁ, titthiyā issayanti samaṇānaṁ. Usūya=dosāvikaraṇe,
anya-e0807n2:96_8: dujjanā guṇavantānaṁ ussūyanti, kā usuyā vijānataṁ. Idha+sidha+rādha+sādha=saṁsiddhiyaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:96_9: ārādho me rañño, rañño bhāgya+mārajjhati, kyā+haṁ ayyānaṁ aparajjhāmi, āyasmato upālittherassa
anya-e0807n2:96_10: upasampadāpekkho upatisso. Bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ, āsuṇanti buddhassa bhikkhū,
anya-e0807n2:96_11: tassa bhikkhuno janoanugiṇāti, patigiṇāti, sādhukāradānādinā taṁ ussahatītyattho.
anya-e0807n2:96_12: Ārocayāmi vo bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo, āmantayāmi te mahārāja, dhammaṁ te desissāmi,
anya-e0807n2:96_13: desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, yathā no bhagavā byākareyya, niruttiṁ te
anya-e0807n2:96_14: pavakkhāmi, alaṁ me rajjaṁ, alaṁ bhikkhu pattassa, alaṁ mallo mallassa, arahati mallo
anya-e0807n2:96_15: mallassa, alaṁ te idha vāsena, kiṁ me ekena tiṇṇenāti sabbattha sambandhe chaṭṭhī.
anya-e0807n2:97_0: Evaṁ āyu bhoto hotu, ciraṁ jīvitaṁ, bhaddaṁ, kalyāṇaṁ, atthaṁ, payojanaṁ, kusalaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:97_1: anāmayaṁ, hitaṁ, patthaṁ, sukhaṁ, sātaṁ, bhoto hotu, sādhu sammuti me tassa, puttassā+vikareyya
anya-e0807n2:97_2: guyha+matthaṁ, tassa me sakko pāturahosi, tassa pahiṇeyya, bhikkhūnaṁ dūtaṁ pāhesi,
anya-e0807n2:97_3: kappati samaṇānaṁ āyogo , ekassa dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ vā pahoti, upamaṁ te karissāmi, añjaliṁte
anya-e0807n2:97_4: paggaṇhāmi, tassa phāsu, lokassa+ttho, namo te purisājañña, sotthi tassa, samattho
anya-e0807n2:97_5: mallo mallassa, tassa hitaṁ, tassa sukhaṁ, svāgataṁ te mahārājāti sabbattha sambandhe chaṭṭhī.
anya-e0807n2:102: Yathā+ssā dhāvatā poso, pato, rukkhāphalanti ca.
anya-e0807n2:103: Tattha calāvadhi dhāvatā assā puriso patati, acalāvadhi pabbatā otaranti vanacārakāti.
anya-e0807n2:104_0: Tañca avadhi visayakriyāvisesassa niddiṭṭhattā niddiṭṭhavisayaṁ, yattha apa apagamanakriyaṁ
anya-e0807n2:104_1: upāttaṁ=ajjhāhaṭaṁ visayaṁ katvā pavattati, taṁ upāttaṁ. Yaṁ kenaci guṇena ukkaṁsiyati,
anya-e0807n2:104_2: taṁ anumeyyaṁ. Yathā gāmā apenti munayo, nagarā niggato rājā, pāpā cittaṁ nivārenti.
anya-e0807n2:104_3: Valāhakā vijjotate, kusulato pacatīti. Ettha ca vaḷāhakā nikkhamma, kusulato apanetvāti
anya-e0807n2:104_4: ca pubbakriyā ajjhāharīyati. Mathurā pāṭaliputtakehi abhirūpāti anumīyati. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n2:107_0: Bhayahetumhi-corā bhayaṁ jāyati, taṇhāya jāyati bhayaṁ, pāpato uttasati, natthi soko
anya-e0807n2:107_1: kuto bhayaṁ. Akkhātari-upajjhāyā sikkhaṁ gaṇhāti, ācariyamhā adhīto suṇāti vā. Buddhasmā
anya-e0807n2:107_2: parājenti aññatitthiyā, parājitā bhavantītyattho. Himavatā pabhavati gaṅgā, aciravatiyā
anya-e0807n2:107_3: pabhavanti kunnadiyo. Urasmā jāto putto, kammato jātaṁ indriyaṁ, upajjhāyā antaradhāyati
anya-e0807n2:107_4: sisso, mātāpitūhi antaradhārayati putto, nilīyatītyattho. Dūratthayogekīvadūro ito
anya-e0807n2:107_5: naḷakāragāmo, tato have dūrataraṁ vadanti, gāmato nātidūre, ārakā te moghapurisā
anya-e0807n2:107_6: imasmā dhammavinayā, ārakā tehi bhagavā dūratova namassanti, addasa dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:107_7: Antikatthayoge-antikaṁ gāmā, āsannaṁ gāmā, samīpaṁ gāmā. Parimāṇe-ito mathurāya catūsu
anya-e0807n2:107_8: yojanesu saṁkassaṁ, rājagahato pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake sāvatthi. Kālaparimāṇe-ito
anya-e0807n2:107_9: ekanavutikappamatthake, ito vassasatasahassassa accayena buddho loke uppajjissati.
anya-e0807n2:107_10: Pāsādā saṁkameyya, pāsādaṁ abhiruhitvā saṁkameyyāti attho, tathā hatthikkhandhā saṁkameyya,
anya-e0807n2:107_11: abhidhammā pucchanti, abhidhammaṁ sutvāti attho, āsanā vuṭṭhaheyya. Disatthavācīhi
anya-e0807n2:107_12: yoge-ito sā purimā disā, ito sā dakkhiṇā disā, avīcito yāva bhavaggaṁ, uddhaṁ pādatalā,
anya-e0807n2:107_13: adho kesamatthakā. Vibhajane-yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi, attadanto
anya-e0807n2:107_14: tato varaṁ, kiñcāpi dānato sīlaṁ varaṁ, tato mayā bahutaraṁ sutaṁ, sīlameva sutā
anya-e0807n2:107_15: seyyo. Āratippayoge-ārati virati pāpā, pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, adinnādānā paṭivirato,
anya-e0807n2:107_16: appaṭiviratā musāvādā. Suddhatthayoge-lobhanīyehi dhammehi suddho, mātuto ca pituto
anya-e0807n2:107_17: ca suddho anupakkuṭṭho. Pamocanatthayoge-parimutto dukkhasmāti vadāmi, mutto+smi
anya-e0807n2:107_18: mārabandhanā, na te muccanti maccunā, mutto+haṁ+sabbapāsehi. Vivecane-vivicceva kāmehi,
anya-e0807n2:107_19: vivicca akusalehi dhammehi. Pamāṇatthe-āyāmato ca vitthārato ca yojanaṁ, gambhīrato
anya-e0807n2:107_20: ca puthulato ca yojanaṁ candabhāgāya parimāṇaṁ, parikkhepato navayojanasataparimāṇo
anya-e0807n2:107_21: majjhimadeso. Pubbādiyoge-pubbeva me bhikkhave sambodhā, ito pubbe nāhosi, tato paraṁ
anya-e0807n2:107_22: paccantimā janapadā, tato aparena samayena. Pañhe-kuto+si tvaṁ, kuto bhavaṁ, pāṭaliputtato.
anya-e0807n2:107_23: Kicchā laddhanti guṇe pañcamī, kicchena me adhigatanti hetumhi karaṇe vā tatiyā,
anya-e0807n2:108: Kathaṁ ‘‘thokaṁ calatī’’ti, kriyāvisesane kammani dutiyā, thokaṁ calanaṁ karotītyattho, thokanti calanakriyāya visesanattā kriyāvisesanaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:110: Nyāyasiddhaṁ yato tasmā, tadatthaṁ na visuṁ vidhi.
anya-e0807n2:111_0: Nyāyasiddhaṁva=calananti yasmā bhāve ano, tasmā bhāvasse+kattā ekavacananti ñāyā
anya-e0807n2:111_1: ekattañca, bhāve anattā napuṁsakattañca, karotikriyāya sambandhena kammattañca sijjhatīti.
anya-e0807n2:113: Tato kriyā ca bhāvo ca, sāmaññaṁ tesu gamyate –
anya-e0807n2:115_0: Thokatthe-thokā muccati. Sabbattha savisaye pañcamī. Ettha ‘‘vivakkhā lokikā sā ca,
anya-e0807n2:115_1: na sakkā anivattituṁ’’ti vuttattā aniṭṭhappasaṅgo na siyā. Mariyādāyaṁ-āpabbatā khettaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:115_2: Abhividhimhi-ābrahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchati, pabbataṁ vajjetvā, brahmalokamhi byāpetvāti
anya-e0807n2:115_3: ca attho. Ettha vajjamānasīmā mariyādā, gayhamānasīmā abhividhi.
anya-e0807n2:117: Vajjane vattamānehī apaparīhi yoge pañcamī hoti. Apasālāya āyanti vāṇijā, parisālāya āyanti vāṇijā, sālaṁ vajjetvāti attho.
anya-e0807n2:119: Paṭinidhimhi patidāne ca vattamānena patinā yoge nāmasmā pañcamī hoti. Buddhasmā pati sāriputto, ghata+massa telasmā pati dadāti.
anya-e0807n2:121: Ritesaddayoge nāmasmā dutiyā hoti pañcamī ca. Rite saddhammā, rite saddhammaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:123: Vinā+ññatrayoge nāmasmā tatiyā dutiyā pañcamī ca. Vinā vātena, vinā vātaṁ, vinā vātasmā. Aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakena, aññatra dhammaṁ, aññatra dhammā.
anya-e0807n2:125: Etehi yoge tatiyā hoti pañcamī ca. Bhinnayogakaraṇaṁ dutiyānivattanatthaṁ. Puthageva janena, puthageva janasmā, janena nānā, janasmā nānā.
anya-e0807n2:127_0: Sambandhe chaṭṭhī hoti. Rañño purisoti vutte yasmā rājā dadāti, puriso gaṇhāti, tasmā
anya-e0807n2:127_1: rājapurisoti viññāyati. Evameva yo yassa āyatto sevakādibhāvena bhaṇḍabhāvena vā
anya-e0807n2:127_3: vā, āgamīvasena vā, so tividhopi attho sambandho nāma. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n2:129: Sambandho nāma so attho, tattha chaṭṭhī vidhīyate.
anya-e0807n2:130: Pāratantyañhi sambandho, tattha chaṭṭhī bhave tito;
anya-e0807n2:132_0: Upādhisaṅkhātavisesanato tāva-rañño puriso. Ettha ca brāhmaṇādisāmito nivattetīti
anya-e0807n2:132_1: rājā visesanaṁ, puriso tena visesiyatīti visesso. Bhaṇḍasambandhato-pahutaṁ me dhanaṁ
anya-e0807n2:132_2: sakka, ekassa paṭivīso, bhikkhussa pattacīvaraṁ. Samīpato-ambavanassa avidūre, nibbānasseva
anya-e0807n2:132_3: santike. Samūhe-suvaṇṇassa rāsi, bhikkhūnaṁ samūho. Avayave-manussasseva te sīsaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:132_4: rukkhassa sākhā. Vikāre-suvaṇṇassa vikati, bhaṭṭhadhaññānaṁ sattu. Kāriye-yavassa
anya-e0807n2:132_5: aṅkuro, meghassa saddo, puttāpi tassa bahavo, kammānaṁ phalaṁ vipāko. Avatthāyaṁ-khandhānaṁ
anya-e0807n2:132_6: pātubhāvo, jarā, bhedo vā. Jātiyaṁ-manussassa bhāvo, manussānaṁ jāti. Guṇe-suvaṇṇassa
anya-e0807n2:132_7: vaṇṇo, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassa buddhassa guṇaghoso, pupphānaṁ gandho, phalānaṁ
anya-e0807n2:132_8: raso, cittassa phusanā, sippikānaṁ sataṁ natthi, tilānaṁ muṭṭhi, tesaṁ samāyogo,
anya-e0807n2:132_9: sandhino vimokkho, tathāgatassa paññāpāramiṁ ārabbha, sukhaṁ te, dukkhaṁ te, cetaso
anya-e0807n2:132_10: parivitakko udapādi, paññāya paṭubhāvo, rūpassa lahutā, mudutā vā, upacayo vā. Kriyāsambandhe-pādassa
anya-e0807n2:132_11: ukkhepanaṁ, avakkhepanaṁ vā, hatthassa samiñjanaṁ, dānaṁ, pasāraṇaṁ, dhātūnaṁ gamanaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:132_12: ṭhānaṁ, nisajjā, sayanaṁ vā, tathāgatassa nāmagottādi, tassa kāraṇaṁ, tassa mātāpitaro,
anya-e0807n2:132_13: tassa purato pāturahosi, nagarassa dakkhiṇato, vassānaṁ tatiye māse, na tassa upamā,
anya-e0807n2:133: Gāvassa jāti, dhavalo, gati, siṅgaṁ, nāmanti+dha;
anya-e0807n2:134: Dabbassāpi ca jātyādi, visessā honti kāmato.
anya-e0807n2:137_0: Ṭhānito-yuvaṇṇāna+meo luttā. Āgamito-suña sassa. Sāmiyoge-devāna+mindo, migānaṁ rājā.
anya-e0807n2:137_1: Rujādiyoge-devadattassa rujati, tassa rogo uppajji, mahāsenāpatīnaṁ ujjhāpetabbaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:137_2: rajakassa vatthaṁ dadāti, musāvādassa ottappaṁ iccādi. Yajassa yoge-pupphassa buddhassa
anya-e0807n2:137_3: yajati, pupphenātyattho. Evaṁ ghatassa aggiṁ juhati. Suhitatthe-pattaṁ odanassa pūretvā,
anya-e0807n2:137_4: pūraṁ nānāpakārassa asucino, pūraṁ hiraññasuvaṇṇassa, pūrati bālo pāpassa. Kitakappayoge-bahulaṁvidhānā
anya-e0807n2:137_5: chaṭṭhī, rañño sammato, pūjito, sakkato, apacito, mānito vā, amataṁ tesaṁ bhikkhave
anya-e0807n2:137_6: aparibhuttaṁ, yesaṁ kāyagatā sati aparibhuttā, sādhusammato bahujanassa, suppaṭividdhā
anya-e0807n2:137_7: buddhānaṁ dhammadhātu, dhammassa gutto medhāvī. Kammatthe-tassa bhavanti vattāro,
anya-e0807n2:137_8: sahasā kammassa kattāro, amatassa dātā, bhinnānaṁ sandhātā, sahitānaṁ anuppadātā,
anya-e0807n2:137_9: bodhetā pajāya, kammassa kārako natthi, vipākassa ca vedako, avisaṁvādako lokassa,
anya-e0807n2:137_10: catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ upādāya pasādo. Sarati+cchāyoge-mātu sarati, na tesaṁ koci
anya-e0807n2:137_11: sarati, sattānaṁ kammapaccayā, puttassa icchati. Karotissa (yoge) – udakassa patikurute,
anya-e0807n2:137_13: chaṭṭhī, assavanatāya dhammassa pariyāyanti, kinnu kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi,
anya-e0807n2:137_14: sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno, bhīto catunnaṁ āsīvisānaṁ ghoravisānaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0807n2:139: Tulyatthena yoge vā chaṭṭhī hoti tatiyā ca. Pitu tulyo, pitarā vā, mātu tulyo, mātarā vā.
anya-e0807n2:141_0: Kattukammaṭṭhānaṁ nisajja+pacanādikriyānaṁ yo ādhāro, taṁ ādhārakārakaṁ nāma. Kathaṁ
anya-e0807n2:141_1: kaṭe nisīdati devadatto, thāliyaṁ odanaṁ pacati, devadatta+taṇḍulānaṁ kattu+kammānaṁ
anya-e0807n2:141_2: dhāraṇato tadaṭṭhaāsana+pacanakriyaṁ kaṭa+thāliyo dhārenti nāma, tasmiṁ sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0807n2:142_0: So byāpiko, opasilesiko, vesayiko, sāmīpikoti catubbidho. Tattha yo ādheyyassa nissesādhārabhūto,
anya-e0807n2:142_1: so byāpiko, yathā tilesu telaṁ atthi, khīresu jalaṁ, dadhimhi sappi. Paccekasiddhānaṁ
anya-e0807n2:142_2: bhāvānaṁ yaṁ ādheyyabhāvena upasilesanaṁ allīyanaṁ atthi, so opasilesiko. Yathā āsane
anya-e0807n2:142_3: nisinno saṅgho, thāliyaṁ odanaṁ pacati, ghaṭe udaka+matthi, dūre ṭhito, samīpe ṭhito.
anya-e0807n2:142_4: Yattha samīpe samīpīvohāraṁ katvā tadāyattatādīpanatthaṁ ādhārabhāvo upacarīyati,
anya-e0807n2:142_5: taṁ sāmīpikaṁ, yathā gaṅgāyaṁ ghoso, gaṅgāya samīpe vajotyattho. Sāvatthiyaṁ viharati
anya-e0807n2:142_6: jetavane. Yattha aññathābhāvavasena desantarāvacchedavasena vā ādhāraparikappo ,
anya-e0807n2:142_7: so vesayito. Yathā ākāse sakuṇā caranti, bhūmiyaṁ manussā, jale macchā, pāsādesu
anya-e0807n2:142_8: patito, pāpasmiṁ ramatī mano, pasanno buddhasāsane, paññāya sādhu, vinaye nipuṇo,
anya-e0807n2:146: Sāmīpiko tu gaṅgādi, ākāso visayo mato.
anya-e0807n2:148: Nimittatthe sattamī hoti. Ajinamhi haññate dīpi, kuñjaro dantesu haññate, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṁ. Sabbattha nimityattho.
anya-e0807n2:150_0: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati, tato sattamī. Kāle gāvīsu duyhamānāsugato,
anya-e0807n2:150_1: duddhāsu āgato. Etthagamanakriyāya dohanakriyācihanaṁ, āgamanakriyāya duddhākriyācihanaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:150_2: eva+muparipi. Pubbaṇhasamaye gato, sāyanhasamaye āgato, jāyamāne kho sāriputta bodhisatte
anya-e0807n2:153: Imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti iccādi. ‘‘Akāle vassatī tassa, kāle tassa na vassatī’’ti visayasattamī.
anya-e0807n2:155_0: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati, tato chaṭṭhī hoti sattamī cā+nādare
anya-e0807n2:155_1: gamyamāne. Akāmakānaṁ mātāpitūnaṁ rudantānaṁ pabbaji, mātāpitūsu rudantesu vā. ‘‘Ākoṭayanto
anya-e0807n2:155_2: so neti, sivirājassa pekkhate’’, ‘‘maccu ādāya gacchati, pekkhamāne mahājane’’.
anya-e0807n2:156_0: Gunnaṁ sāmīti sambandhe chaṭṭhī, gosu sāmīti visayasattamī. Evaṁ gunnamissaro, gosvi+ssaro,
anya-e0807n2:156_1: gunnaṁ adhipati, gosu adhipati, gunnaṁ dāyādo, gosu dāyādo, gunnaṁ sakkhī, gosu sakkhī,
anya-e0807n2:156_2: gunnaṁ patibhū, gosu patibhū, gunnaṁ pasuto, gosu pasuto, kusalā naccagītassa, kusalā
anya-e0807n2:156_3: naccagīte, āyutto kaṭakaraṇassa, āyutto kaṭakaraṇe. Tathā ādhāravacanicchāyaṁ sattamī,
anya-e0807n2:156_4: bhikkhūsu abhivādenti, muddhani cumbitvā, bāhāsu gahetvā, hatthesu piṇḍāya caranti,
anya-e0807n2:156_5: kadalīsu gaje rakkhanti, ñāṇasmiṁ pasanno, ñāṇasmiṁ ussukkoti visayasattamī.
anya-e0807n2:158_0: Jātiguṇakriyāhi samudāyate+kadesassa puthakkaraṇaṁ niddhāraṇaṁ, yato taṁ karīyati,
anya-e0807n2:158_1: tato chaṭṭhīsattamiyo honti. Sālayo sūkadhaññānaṁ pathyatamā, sūkadhaññesu sālayo
anya-e0807n2:158_2: pathyatamā. Kaṇhā gāvīnaṁ sampannakhīratamā, kaṇhā gāvīsu sampannakhīratamā. Gacchataṁ
anya-e0807n2:160: Ādhikye atthe upena yuttamhā sattamī hoti. Upakhāriyaṁ doṇo, khāriyā doṇo adhikotyattho. Tathā upanikkhe kahāpaṇaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:162_0: Sāmibhāvatthe adhinā yuttamhā sattamī hoti. Adhibrahmadatte pañcālā, adhipañcālesu
anya-e0807n2:162_1: brahmadatto, brahmadattissarā pañcālāti attho. Adhidevesu buddho, sammutidevādīhi
anya-e0807n2:163: Ettha ca yathāvuttesu atthesu ayaṁ bhedo –
anya-e0807n2:164_0: Kārakaṁ sādhakaṁ nibbattakaṁ kriyānimittanti atthato ekameva, tañca daṇḍo, dhavalo,
anya-e0807n2:164_1: pacanaṁ, citto, goti dabba+guṇa+kriyā+nāma+jātibhedena pañcavidhampi kamma+kattādivasena
anya-e0807n2:164_2: chabbidhaṁ, taṁ sattikārakaṁ, tadādhārabhūtadabbādayo tatraṭṭhakārakaṁ, na mukhyato.
anya-e0807n2:164_3: Mukhyato ce honti, tesaṁ sattidabbānaṁ aññamaññabyāvaṭarūpattā yo ādhāro, so ādhāroyeva,
anya-e0807n2:164_4: kismiñcikāle karaṇaṁ vā katturūpabhūto vā na hoti, tasmā thāli pacati, thāliyā pacati,
anya-e0807n2:164_5: thāliyaṁ pacatītyādinā ekassa vatthuno kattu+karaṇā+dhārabhedo na siyā. Sattipakkhe
anya-e0807n2:164_6: pana dabbādīnaṁ anekasattiyā ādhārattā sattiyā dabbādayo vivakkhitā taṁ taṁ kārakaṁ
anya-e0807n2:164_7: hotīti dabbādīnaṁ abhedepi kārakabhedo yujjate. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n2:167_0: Thāli vatthuto ekā cedapi sattikārakabhūtakattu+karaṇā+dhārādīnaṁ bhedena bheda+mupayāti,
anya-e0807n2:167_1: kimiva rāma+rāvaṇādivesadhārīnaṭako tesaṁ nāmavasena rāmo, rāvaṇoti bheda+mupayāti,
anya-e0807n2:171_0: Ettha ca sattibhūtakattādayo mukhyakārakaṁ, taṁyogena dabbabhūtathālī guṇakārakaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:171_1: te ca kathaṁ kriyāya kārakā honti. Kattā attanā patiṭṭhitāya hasati+naccaticcādikriyāya
anya-e0807n2:171_2: nimittaṁ hoti. Kammañca attanā patiṭṭhitakriyāya tadatthabhūtaindhanādīni pavattentaṁ
anya-e0807n2:171_3: ‘‘odanaṁ pacatī’’tyādo nimittaṁ. ‘Kaṭṭhehi paccatī’tyādo kaṭṭhāni jalanakriyāya sādhetabbapākassa
anya-e0807n2:171_4: aṅgabhāvena nimittaṁ. ‘Pharasunā chindatī’tyādo pharasu ca kaṭṭhānaṁ dvidhāpavattiyā
anya-e0807n2:171_5: nimittaṁ. Kammañca kriyāya sambandhīyamānabyāpye sati nimittabhāvena kriyāya nimittaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:171_7: godānā+panayana+pacanakriyānaṁ nimittattā kriyāya nimittāni honti. Tesaṁ yathāsakaṁ
anya-e0807n2:171_8: kriyāya pavattako kattā, tasmā sa eva padhāno kattāti vohāraṁ labhati, aññesaṁ karaṇādīnaṁ
anya-e0807n2:171_9: kattubhāve satipi appadhānattā taṁ na labhati.
anya-e0807n2:174: Ekassa kattuno eva, sabbesaṁ kattutaṁ vinā.
anya-e0807n2:176: Karaṇādīnaṁ abhāvattā, kārakaṁ na hi chabbidhanti.
anya-e0807n2:180: Etaṁ sabhāvato upalabbhamānaṁ karaṇādīsu kattuttaṁ paresaṁ karaṇādīnaṁ jalana+dhāraṇādikriyāya aṅgaṁ upāyati appadhānanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0807n2:182: Pabhedā sattadhā kammaṁ, kattā pañcavidho bhave.
anya-e0807n2:183: Karaṇaṁ duvidhaṁ hoti, sampadānaṁ tidhā mataṁ;
